extension.description: Let Kodi control your Lifx lights. Turn the lights into a room-sized theater with ambilight, and automatically dim and un-dim them when playback starts/stops. It controls Lifx lights based on the following light groups, fully configurable using the setup wizard from addon settings: 1. Theater Group - Dim the lights when playback starts, undim when paused, restore when stops 2. Ambilight Group - Change color and brightness of lights based on the current picture frame 3. Static Group - Turn the light on when playback starts, off when it stops
